name: Puppy Doge VR
description: Puppy Doge VR is a light VR experience where players casually interact with a puppy
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
